movies.title: Green Days
movies.plot: Not wanting to lose, Yi-rang orchestrates a collapse in the middle of a relay race even though she's on the verge of giving up her dream of becoming an athlete. At the same time, Soo-min transfers in from Seoul and Cheol-soo, who dreams of becoming a scientist, come into her life. They are all immature but they are in the midst of youthful aspiration. With this warm-hearted animation, HAN Hye-jin and AN Jae-hoon encourage Yi-rang's dreams and portray the fantasy and flutter of adolescence through encounters with good people. Set in the '80s and '90s, an old umbrella and a railroad crossing the downtown in the film is the stuff that reminds us of our lost past, evoking a reminiscence in the audience of that which is vanished. It is a way of evoking the real "dreams" that we have lost in this modern society where a rapid capitalization is progressing.

biography.bio: Hye-Young Jeon is an actress, known for Green Days (2010).
biography.name: Hye-Young Jeon

biography.bio: Yeon-Seo Oh is an actress, known for Just Friends (2010), Shine or Go Crazy (2015) and Medical Top Team (2013).
biography.name: Yeon-Seo Oh

biography.bio: Park Shin-hye was born in Gwangju, but raised in Paju, South Korea. Shin Hye Studied music, theater and singing in Chung-Ang University, Korea. Shin-hye made her acting debut in a Korean drama series, Stairway to heaven. She later on gained her popularity through another Korean series, You're beautiful with co-star Jang Keun-suk. She is best known for her leading roles in the television dramas, Heartstrings (2011), Flower Boys Next Door (2013), The Heirs (2013) and Pinocchio (2014).
biography.name: Shin-hye Park

biography.bio: Joo-Ae Seo is an actress, known for Green Days (2010) and I Believed in Men (2011).
biography.name: Joo-Ae Seo

biography.bio: Chang-ui Song is an actor, known for Doctor Frost (2014), A Reason to Live (2011) and You've Fallen for Me (2011).
biography.name: Chang-ui Song

biography.bio: Sang Hyun Uhm is an actor, known for Tekken 5 (2004), Lili à la découverte du monde sauvage (2011) and Tekken 5: Dark Resurrection (2005).
biography.name: Sang Hyun Uhm

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Women in Film Korea Award
